# Virtual environments
.venv/
venv/
ENV/
env/

# Python cache
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

# Compiled
*.so
*.dylib

# Build / distribution folders
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.*
*.env

# IDE / Editor settings
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# SQLite database (varsa)
*.sqlite
*.db

# PyInstaller / exe output
*.spec
output/
dist/
build/

# Jupyter notebooks checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Test coverage
htmlcov/
.coverage
.pytest_cache/

# Local configs
config.local.json
config.yaml
